imdb.title: Black Clover
imdb.plot: Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus.

episodes.title: The 5 Spirit Guardians
episodes.plot: Asta and the other Magic Knights chosen to train in the Heart Kingdom are joined by Magna and they finally start their training under Loropechika and the Spirit Guardians of Lightning, Earth, Plants, Fire, and Wind and Undine. Since Asta has no magic to begin with, he ends up sparring with Gaja, the Spirit Guardian of Lighting. They Magic Knights all work harder to surpass their limits.

episodes.title: Awakening Power
episodes.plot: While Asta and the others were training in the Heart Kingdom, back in the Clover Kingdom, Yami asked Mereoleona to help him train. Meanwhile, the Spade Kingdom's forces continues to draw nearer as it continues its invasion.

episodes.title: The Five-Leaf Clover
episodes.plot: Months after arriving at the Heart Kingdom, Asta still doesn't have any magic, but he's become more powerful at an alarming speed due to his training with the Spirit Guardians. Anti-magic is one of the magic attributes that falls into the "Arcane Stage" and is needed to defeat the devil. Because of that, Gaja asks Asta how exactly he obtained the five-leaf grimoire.

episodes.title: The Beginning of Hope and Despair
episodes.plot: The Spade Kingdom successfully takes over the Diamond Kingdom and then sets their sights on the Clover Kingdom and Heart Kingdom. The Spade Kingdom troops get through the strong magic region using a mobile fortress which sucks up the mana of the Spade Kingdom citizens who were taken by force. But then Asta, who had finished his training with the Spirit Guardians, comes to the rescue! Meanwhile, Luck and Leopold head to the Spade Kingdom in order to try to take over one of their bases.

episodes.title: Quiet Lakes and Forest Shadows
episodes.plot: Charmy, who had tagged along with Asta and the others to train in the Heart Kingdom, keeps trying to eat up all of the food in the Heart Kingdom. Asta tries to take her back and goes to the forest Charmy is last seen. However, Charmy had also trained with the Spirit Guardians and had become even more powerful. Meanwhile, Yuno is contacted by Sister Lily and heads back to his home village of Hage.

episodes.title: The Messenger from the Spade Kingdom
episodes.plot: Ralph tells Yuno to take a look at his past while Zenon Zogratis attacks the Golden Dawn's headquarters with the Dark disciples to capture William Vangeance.

episodes.title: Zeno's Power
episodes.plot: After hearing about the Golden Dawn members being in trouble, Yuno hurries back. When he returned, their headquaters had been destroyed and many of the squad members were near death. Yuno's rage explodes. Meanwhile, the members who can still fight are doing their best to hold up against the attackers that includes one of the members of the Dark Triad, Zenon, and his minions.

episodes.title: The Great War Breaks Out
episodes.plot: Dante Zogratis attacks The Black Bulls to capture Yami while Vanica makes her move in The Heart Kingdom.

episodes.title: Dante vs The Captain of the Black Bulls Squad
episodes.plot: Grey reminisces on her past. Meanwhile the fight between Dante and Asta is continuing!

episodes.title: Battlefield: Heart Kingdom
episodes.plot: Yami Sukehiro, Captain of the Black Bull, is engaged in a fierce battle with Dante Zogratis of the Dark Triad. The blow finally caught Dante! But his fear self-renewing abilities quickly restore him back to life as he starts to talk about his plan to destroy the world and turn the Black Bull upside down. Meanwhile in the Heart Kingdom, Leopold Vermillion of the Crimson Lion, Charmy Pappitson of the Black Bull struggle to save the kingdom from an enemy that outmatches even the most powerful Spirit Guardians.

episodes.title: Water Crusade
episodes.plot: In the Spade Kingdom a spy from the Clover Kingdom is discovered in Dante's office, revealed to be wearing a Black Bull robe under their cape. Vanica, the one who cursed Loropechika, demands Loropechika duel her while her masochistic subordinate, Disciple Robero, keeps Noelle and Mimosa busy.

episodes.title: Captain Yami Sukehiro
episodes.plot: Vanica and her subordinates continue their attack on the Heart Kingdom. Meanwhile, back at the Black Bulls' hideout, Captain Yami's fight against Dante continued. Despite how overwhelmingly powerful Dante is, Yami continues to fight back, landing another powerful blow onto Dante. However, no matter how much Dante is damaged, he continues to regenerate. What will Yami do?

episodes.title: Black Oath
episodes.plot: As the battles in the Heart Kingdom begin to come to an end, Asta and Yami decide to work together as they continue in their fight against Dante Zogratis of the Dark Triad.

episodes.title: Stirrings of the Strongest
episodes.plot: Yami and Vangeance are taken to the Spade Kingdom so that the ritual to open the gate to the underworld can begin. Despite how hurt he is, Asta tries to escape the infirmary to go and save Yami, however he is stopped by a mage named Nacht Faust, who also happens to be a devil-possessed. He offers to show Asta how to use his devil powers even better. Meanwhile, the Magic Knight Squad Captains hold an emergency meeting. The Golden Dawn has almost been completely annihilated, and Yuno shows up to the meeting, showing new resolve.

episodes.title: The Devil-Binding Ritual
episodes.plot: Noelle and the others were involved in the explosion that Vanica caused back in the Heart Kingdom and were left unconscious. When they woke up, they found themselves in the new home of the elves that was located in a strong magic region just beyond the Heart Kingdom. There, Noelle has an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Asta was learning from Nacht how to control his devil powers, but it was a very dangerous method. In order to save Yami from the Dark Triad, Asta decides to undergo this trial.

episodes.title: Faraway Future
episodes.plot: Nacht summons the devil who had been giving Asta his powers all this time. In order to use his devil powers to their fullest extent, Asta must defeat his devil and bind him, but he also offers and alternative solution that is a bit surprising. Yuno, Noelle, and the others also swear that they will get revenge on the Dark Triad and get back Captain Yami and Captain Vangeance. A new battle is about to begin!

episodes.title: Release from Misfortune
episodes.plot: While the possessed elves set their sights on the capital, bent on destroying mankind, Asta's newest sword could be the key to stopping them for good.

episodes.title: Lightning of Rage vs Friends
episodes.plot: After a surprise encounter with their possessed squad-mate Luck, Magna and Vanessa go to extremes in an attempt to free their friend.

episodes.title: Smiles, Tears
episodes.plot: Before pursuing the elves to the royal capitol, Asta and friends stop by the Black Bulls hideout in order to check in with their friends.

episodes.title: Path of Revenge, Path of Atonement
episodes.plot: Fueled by Charmy's magical meals, Asta's team detours to defend Hecairo on their way to the royal capital and picks up a trio of most unlikely allies.

episodes.title: The Battle for Clover Castle
episodes.plot: Yami and Finral take on possessed members of the Golden Dawn; Noelle and Nozel must defend their siblings when the Silva family home is under siege.

episodes.title: Battlefield Dancer
episodes.plot: Noelle must think outside the box to gain the upper hand in the pitched battle at House Silva. Thoughts of her mother help her push past her limits.

episodes.title: Spatial Mage Brothers
episodes.plot: Finral fights to save his younger brother Langris from the diabolical elf within. Newly reincarnated elves meet with Rhya to discuss their next move.

episodes.title: The Raging Bull Joins the Showdown!!
episodes.plot: Rhya welcomes back two old allies as the Apostles of Sephira open an eerie portal over the capital. Asta and friends fight to stop the elvish Gauche.

episodes.title: The Eyes in the Mirror
episodes.plot: Vanessa leads a group of Black Bulls trapped in a deadly dream world while Sally runs some quick experiments. Henry is determined to save his friends.

episodes.title: Humans Who Can Be Trusted
episodes.plot: Luck and friends gain a unusual ally to fight against Dorothy Unsworth; Droit remembers the humans' atrocities against his people.

episodes.title: Storming the Shadow Palace
episodes.plot: Asta and some of the others follow Captain Yami to the Shadow Palace but are stopped by the elves; Captain Fuegoleon and Captain Mereoleona show off their true powers.

episodes.title: The Final Invaders
episodes.plot: As Noelle does battle with Fana, Asta and Mimosa struggle to counter Rill's sinister spells; Charmy discovers a shocking fact about her origins.

episodes.title: Mastermind
episodes.plot: The elf Ronne's betrayal pulls back the curtain to reveal a truly fiendish puppetmaster who's not nearly done pulling the strings--not by a long shot.

episodes.title: The Ultimate Natural Enemy
episodes.plot: Nozel's Mercury spells are the perfect match for Patry's Light Magic, but Asta's plan to drive the elf out of Vengeance's body doesn't go as expected.

episodes.title: Breaking the Seal
episodes.plot: As Yami and the elvish Charlotte test the limits of the devil's mighty Word Soul Magic, Nero asks Finral a favor and reveals a centuries old secret.

episodes.title: A Reunion Across Time and Space
episodes.plot: A flashback to the truth behind the first Wizard King's battle against the demon serves as a prelude for a new face joining the fight against the devil.

episodes.title: The Final Attack
episodes.plot: Licht and Lumiere fight against the devil using incredibly powerful magic. But the devil has incredible regeneration powers and quickly heals himself, making him difficult to defeat.

episodes.title: Dawn
episodes.plot: The fight is not yet over: the kingdom is still rife with elves bent on revenge. Patry looks within for a solution--then it's time to bid farewell.

episodes.title: Three Problems
episodes.plot: Yami is agog at what--or who--has taken the place of Julius's body. Asta and Secre are called before the Magic Parliament for their devilish dealings.

episodes.title: As Pitch Black as It Gets
episodes.plot: Asta's Black Asta form does him no favors in the court of Damnatio Kira. It's up to a powerful few to save Asta's head from the chopping block.

episodes.title: Nero Reminiscences... Part One
episodes.plot: Because she used forbidden magic, Nero survived for centuries. In the back of her mind, memories from long ago start to replay in her head. From when Nero was still called Secré and when Secré first met the most powerful mage

episodes.title: Nero Reminiscences... Part Two
episodes.plot: Secre reflects on Patry's reincarnation and that of his fellow elves, the utter havoc they wreaked, how it all ended, and what her future might hold.

episodes.title: Return
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls return to a hideout in dire need of rebuilding, but first they must track down Yami's escaped beasts, now likely feral--and hungry.

episodes.title: The Blue Rose's Confession
episodes.plot: After a meeting with Yami sends Charlotte on a rampage across town, she decides to reveal her feelings for him.

episodes.title: Clues
episodes.plot: A contingent of Black Bulls seeks info from Gordon's family of Curse Magic experts, while Noelle digs deeper into what really killed her mother Acier.

episodes.title: To the Heart Kingdom!
episodes.plot: An expedition to the Heart Kingdom uncovers a beautiful, mana-rich land that is a little less than welcoming. Finral resolves to turn over a new leaf.

episodes.title: Devil Megicula
episodes.plot: Asta and the others manage to meet with the queen of the Heart Kingdom, who had also been chosen by the water spirit, Undine. They are able to confirm that the devil's curse and that the devil was in the Spade Kingdom

episodes.title: The New Magic Knight Captain Conference
episodes.plot: The Wizard King summons the Magic Knight captains to brief them on the alliance with the Heart Kingdom against Megicula and to plan their next steps.

episodes.title: A New Resolve
episodes.plot: Asta and Yuno are given permission to go home to Hage for a little while. Asta was being called a devil in the papers, but Father, Sister Lily, everyone at the church, welcomed them home with open arms

episodes.title: The Lion Awakens
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls get a sudden visit from Mereleona and she drags them to the strong magic region of the Yultim Volcano. There, the Crimson Lion Kings, as well as their captain, and his younger brother Leopold, were waiting for them

episodes.title: The Lion Awakens, Continued
episodes.plot: As Asta and the others were chasing the creature that lived in the cave beneath the Volcano Trail, they happened upon a dungeon. They were then ordered to explore the dungeon by the royal capital, so they split into groups and went in

episodes.title: Those Who Have Been Gathered
episodes.plot: Asta and Noelle return to the Black Bulls hideout only to get taken away by Mereoleona again. The place they were brought this time was the Vermillion estate. Waiting for them there was Captain Fuegoleon, Kirsch, Mimosa, and Sister Theresa

episodes.title: The One Who Has My Heart, My Mind, and Soul
episodes.plot: Finral has dinner with ladies, as a test to see if he can resist their charm. He ends up colliding with Charlotte, who is on a attempted romantic dinner with Yami.

episodes.title: A Black Deep-Sea Story
episodes.plot: Noelle and the other Black Bulls head to Racquey to do some training, when Noelle hears a mysterious voice. Shortly after, they are reunited with Kahono and Kiato. The siblings ask them for help and they head down to the Underwater Temple

episodes.title: Charmy's Century of Hunger, Gordon's Millennium of Loneliness
episodes.plot: Asta and the other Black Bulls continue their training in order to face off with the devil. Charmy is trying to use her cotton magic and her Sheep Cooks to create food to enhance her friends' mana, but she realizes she lacks training

episodes.title: In Zara's Footsteps
episodes.plot: Zora returns to his hometown to visit his father's grave and there he finds a young commoner training and admiring the one who was the first commoner Magic Knight.

episodes.title: A Witch's Homecoming
episodes.plot: Vanessa returns to the Witches' Forest and requests that the Witch Queen teach her ancient magic. In exchange, the Queen tasks her with training two witches, Samantha Kravitz and Elvira Aguirre

episodes.title: A Favor for Julius
episodes.plot: Julius asks Marx to do a favor for him. He wanted him to help with creating new magic items as well as take care of some bandits. Marx is accompanied by the former member of the Eye of the Midnight Sun

episodes.title: The Golden Family
episodes.plot: The Golden Dawn was hard at work trying to get the kingdom back onto its feet. They were trying to make amends for the trouble they had caused while they were possessed. Captain Vangeance puts Alecdora Sandler in charge of a mission

episodes.title: Those Who Remain
episodes.plot: Before the Midnight Sun attacked the capital a young woman named Dazu Tayaku lived with her husband and mother-in-law. Dazu is a user of Catalyst Magic, meaning she can only borrow magic from others but has no magic of her own.

episodes.title: The Tilted Scale
episodes.plot: Kabwe Carillon's team of Devil Banishers returns to Bow Nokude's house in Tiulyu. They report to the other team about their failure to capture Asta. Gordon and Noelle take Asta to Owen, who discovers that it was a sleeping potion.

episodes.title: Those Who Wish To Destroy Devils
episodes.plot: Dazu angrily blames the Magic Knights for not protecting her village before storming off to the Banishers headquarters, the basement of Bou's medical clinic

episodes.title: Rescue
episodes.plot: The Bulls infiltrate Lehart alongside the other Magic Knights and find a large crowd of angry commoners gathered. Vanessa is approached by two Banishers who demand she leaves with them quietly or Secre and Marie will be killed instantly.

episodes.title: Those Who Worship the Devil
episodes.plot: Kabue finally realizes he's been fooled by the Devil Believers, but it's too late for him and his friends. The Black Bull is given a new mission: the capture of the Devil Believer in addition to the rescue of Nero.

episodes.title: Prepared to Die
episodes.plot: Secre warns the Believers an area of strong natural magic stands between them and the Spade Kingdom but the Believers decide to continue.

episodes.title: Become the Light That Shines Through the Darkness
episodes.plot: Asta manages to escape with Noelle and Secre. Nozel and Fuegoleon arrive, causing the Believers to try attacking them; unfortunately this summons a dragon from the strong magic region.

episodes.title: Two Things We Need to Find
episodes.plot: Secre recalls that Lumiere designed a magic tool that could increase magic specifically to help those born with low magic, intending to end the discrimination that created the Believers.

episodes.title: The Challenge of the Maidens
episodes.plot: Grey decides to overcome her chronic shyness and asks Noelle for help. As Grey is not shy when she transforms into other people Noelle suggests she transform her state of mind instead.

episodes.title: Clash! Battle of the Magic Knight Captains!
episodes.plot: The Captains are split into two teams; Yami, Jack, Nozel and Kaiser against Charlotte, Fuegoleon, Dorothy and Vangeance, aiming to destroy the other teams crystals, though Rill is absent for personal reasons.

episodes.title: To Tomorrow!
episodes.plot: The Magic Knight Entrance Exam comes again, marking one year since Asta and Noelle joined the Bulls. Asta is once again swarmed by the Anti-birds for having zero magic.

episodes.title: The Chosen Ones
episodes.plot: The Magic Knight Squad Captains gather for a meeting and an awards ceremony; the captains decide that Asta, Nero, Noelle, Luck, Finral, Mimosa, Leopold, Charlotte and Riley will be going to the Heart Kingdom to train with the Spirit Guardians.

episodes.title: Vice-Captain Langris Vaude
episodes.plot: After Yuno is given the title of 1st Class Magic Knight, Vice Captain Langris decides to competitively spar Yuno with a twist: The loser will leave Golden Dawn.

episodes.title: Whoever's Strongest Wins
episodes.plot: Yuno and the Golden Dawn take point in Kiten, while the Black Bulls' contingent tend to the survivors. Yami has a little chat with William Vangeance.

episodes.title: Behind the Mask
episodes.plot: William Vangeance opens up to Yami about his past, while Finral stands up to his brother Langris. Julius questions the Diamond Kingdom's intentions.

episodes.title: Never Again
episodes.plot: Asta gets shocking news from the top doctor in the entire Clover Kingdom. His fellow Black Bulls rally behind him, scrambling to find a way to help.

episodes.title: The Man Named Fanzell
episodes.plot: A flashback to Asta's days learning the sword under a skilled mage with a complicated past--and a dangerous future. Noelle hopes he can help Asta now.

episodes.title: The Man Named Fanzell Continued
episodes.plot: Fanzell meets Asta again once Asta's joined the Black Bulls, but this time he's far from alone. In the present, Vanessa seeks a cure for Asta's curse.

episodes.title: Infiltration
episodes.plot: Noelle's contingent is intent on infiltrating the Forest of Witches. They'll need mighty magic to get past the relentless security and meet the queen.

episodes.title: Battlefield Decision
episodes.plot: Faced with the destruction of her forest and the deaths of her "daughters," the Queen of Witches helps Asta to help her fend off two invading armies.

episodes.title: Flames of Hatred
episodes.plot: Together, Asta and friends must find a way to extinguish the flames of Fana's deep-seated hatred--and the literal flames of her fire spirit familiar.

episodes.title: Defectors' Atonement
episodes.plot: Fanzell battles Ladros and Mars, his former students from his time in the Diamond Kingdom, and tries to reason with them.

episodes.title: The Promised World
episodes.plot: Fanzell tries to use Asta's anti-magic in combat to defeat Ladros.

episodes.title: Those Who Boost Each Other Up
episodes.plot: Fana shares what she remembers of her past, but her reunion is interrupted by a relentless foe with an insatiable appetite for magic.

episodes.title: Not in the Slightest
episodes.plot: Asta undergoes a startling transformation, fighting like a man possessed. When he learns who's behind this change, he also learns its shocking price.

episodes.title: The Red Thread of Fate
episodes.plot: Vanessa recalls her painful past as she faces off against the Queen of Witches, who is manipulating Asta into killing her squadmates before her eyes.

episodes.title: I'm Home
episodes.plot: Asta and his squadmates learn about the origins of the Eye of the Midnight Sun, Vanessa finds her place, and the Black Bulls make their way back home.

episodes.title: The Eye of the Midnight Sun's Secret
episodes.plot: Klaus helps Yuno and Mimosa get caught up on the Magic Knight Squads' encounters with the Eye of the Midnight Sun. Yami meets with the Wizard King.

episodes.title: A Fun Festival Double Date
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls attend the Star Festival, where Asta and Noelle are roped into a double date. The mood is right to tell each other how they feel...

episodes.title: Battle to the Death? Yami vs. Jack
episodes.plot: Captains Yami and Jack the Ripper are ready to settle their long-running rivalry, while their newest squad members are desperate to rein them in.

episodes.title: The Briar Maiden's Melancholy
episodes.plot: Captain Charlotte of the Blue Rose Knights thinks back to her past, but not before she and Vanessa battle it out in more than one ill-advised contest.

episodes.title: Two New Stars
episodes.plot: The Wizard King announces the latest Magic Knight squad rankings and reveals the two top star-earners, while King Clover introduces a bold new plan.

episodes.title: The Uncrowned, Undefeated Lioness
episodes.plot: Mereoleona Vermillion, the new captain of the Crimson Lion Kings, takes the squad (and a few Black Bulls) along for training in a strong magic region.

episodes.title: Saint Elmo's Fire
episodes.plot: Asta attempts to tap into his mysterious dark powers so he can make it to Mereoleona's hot spring training camp. Noelle learns about her late mother.

episodes.title: The Royal Knights Selection Test
episodes.plot: Magic Knights from every squad gather for the test that will determine who'll be a Royal Knight. The vice-captain of the Purple Orcas causes a stir.

episodes.title: Flower of Resolution
episodes.plot: Round 1 of the tournament sees Asta and Mimosa teaming up for a heated battle against three skilled senior Magic Knights. But what happened to Xerx?

episodes.title: Fierce Battle
episodes.plot: The tournament continues as Magna and Sol fight alongside the conceited Kirsch Vermillion and Finral takes a risk with teammates Leopold and Hamon.

episodes.title: Magic Knight X
episodes.plot: The mysterious Mage X reveals his identity and reflects on his upbringing as a struggling painter turned magic knight, using his unique artistry to wage battle.

episodes.title: Bad Blood
episodes.plot: Luck's team competes in their round. After, Noelle and Yuno's team is up against Solid Silva's team.

episodes.title: Peasant Trap
episodes.plot: Next up - Asta's team vs Magna's.

episodes.title: Mister Delinquent vs. Muscle Brains
episodes.plot: Asta's and Magna's team continue their match. A flashback is shown of when Sol met Char.

episodes.title: Special Little Brother vs. Failed Big Brother
episodes.plot: Finral's team are up against his younger brother's.

episodes.title: The Life of a Certain Man
episodes.plot: The Magic Knights question Langris's sanity as he challenges Asta to a fight in the middle of the tournament. Zora recalls his Magic Knight father.

episodes.title: Petit Clover! The Nightmarish Charmy SP!
episodes.plot: Charmy left the battlefield to a nearby forest to search for ingredients to use when making meals for Yuno and the Wizard King. She accidentally eats a poisonous mushroom and has a dream consisting of all the Clover Clips compiled.

episodes.title: Burn it into you
episodes.plot: The semifinal bout between Asta and Langris comes to a grim conclusion. Luck has a plan that could give his team the edge over Aqua Deer captain Rill.

episodes.title: The Victors
episodes.plot: The final match is underway - Rill's team vs Yuno and Noelle's. Yuno pulls out a new move he had been saving for Asta. The Wizard King offers Zora a place in the magic knights.

episodes.title: Together in the Bath
episodes.plot: In an attempt to cheer up Asta, Captain Yami forces the group to take a bath together. He tells a story of when he is approached by a group of villagers who ask for his help in defending their crops against bandits.

episodes.title: Yami and Vangeance
episodes.plot: Yami tells another tale of his younger days in the Magic Knights: a top-secret mission given to him and William Vangeance by the Wizard King himself.

episodes.title: Formation of the Royal Knights
episodes.plot: Maraleona Vermillion comes to the Black Bulls' hideout and takes the magic knights that were selected for the Royal Knights. They meet the others who were selected and get their new uniforms.

episodes.title: Storming the Eye of the Midnight Sun's Hideout!!!
episodes.plot: The Royal Knights relocate to the royal capital in preparation for their attack on the floating dungeon in Gravito Stones. Klaus warns of enemy spies.

episodes.title: The Black Bulls' Hideout
episodes.plot: Gauche, Grey and Gordon are left alone at the Black Bulls' hideout when they are attacked by the Eye of the Midnight Sun.

episodes.title: Crazy Magic Battle
episodes.plot: The battle at the Black Bulls' hideout rages on. The "ghost" reveals his identity and his powers to help them fight the Eye of the Midnight Sun.

episodes.title: Mereoleona vs. Raia the Disloyal
episodes.plot: 20 beautiful minutes of Maraleona beating the snot out of the Third Eye.

episodes.title: The Wizard King vs. The Leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun
episodes.plot: The Members of the black bulls go through the rubble to find their belongings, Yami is Still Waiting For William and The Wizard King and The Leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun get into their second battle.

episodes.title: Julius Novachrono
episodes.plot: The battle rages on between the Wizard King and Licht, who holds a kingdom's worth of innocent people hostage. Julius recalls his greatest motivation.

episodes.title: New Future
episodes.plot: Lekht has all the stones needed for revive his people, last moments of magic emperor life.

episodes.title: Reincarnation
episodes.plot: Back into the early days of the relationship between elf and humans.

episodes.title: The Black Bulls Captain vs the Crimson Wild Rose
episodes.plot: The rise of elf and start their revenge, Yami try to protect the kingdom.

episodes.title: Overwhelming Disadvantage
episodes.plot: The magic knights are forced to fight against their own comrades after the Eye of the Midnight Sun's spell takes over.

episodes.title: The Sleeping Lion
episodes.plot: The Crimson Lions are struggling to fight against one of their own when a familiar face comes to help them.

episodes.title: The Desperate Path Toward Survival
episodes.plot: Mereoleona is left to face five powerful elf enemies alone, putting her "undefeated" title to the test. Mimosa's Royal Knight teammates turn on her.

episodes.title: We Won't Lose to You
episodes.plot: Asta confronts his rival Yuno, one of many Golden Dawn members to have been taken over by elves. Licht is spurred to action, as are Yami and Finral.

episodes.title: The Lives of the Village in the Sticks
episodes.plot: Even remote little Hage Village is not immune from the chaos overtaking the Clover Kingdom. Asta and Yuno are determined to fight for their hometown.

episodes.title: Two Miracles
episodes.plot: Members of haj village reading letters from Asta and Yuno as they were fighting as magic knights

episodes.title: Asta and Yuno
episodes.plot: Introduction of Asta and Yuno and magical world of Black Clover. Asta struggles to awaken his magic while Yuno achieves glory.

episodes.title: The Boys' Promise
episodes.plot: The grimoire that Yuno received was a legendary grimoire with a four-leaf clover. A bandit named Revchi comes to steal it, and Asta comes to Yuno's rescue.

episodes.title: To the Royal Capital of the Clover Kingdom
episodes.plot: Asta and Yuno set out on their journey to the far-distant royal capital of the Clover Kingdom to take the Magic Knights Entrance Exam. Yes, Asta, too.

episodes.title: The Magic Knights Entrance Exam
episodes.plot: Joining the Magic Knights is the first step on Asta's and Yuno's path to becoming the Wizard King. But does the magicless Asta even stand a chance?

episodes.title: The Path to the Wizard King
episodes.plot: The grueling exam is over, and the Magic Knight captains choose the most promising examinees to join their squads. At least Yuno has what it takes...

episodes.title: The Black Bulls
episodes.plot: Asta must complete a crazy hazing ritual of sorts before he's officially accepted into the ragtag Black Bulls squad. Yuno meets with the Golden Dawn.

episodes.title: The Other New Recruit
episodes.plot: Magna gives Asta a whirlwind tour of the Black Bulls' weird and wonderful hideout, including an introduction to the other newest member of the squad.

episodes.title: Go! Go! First Mission
episodes.plot: Asta is sent on his first mission to fight off boars with the others.

episodes.title: Beast
episodes.plot: Something's not right in Saussy Village: it's enveloped in a magic mist obscuring the nefarious goings-on within. Asta, Noelle, and Magna investigate.

episodes.title: Those Who Protect
episodes.plot: After Asta, Ragna and Noe go beyond their limitations they finally defeat the bandits.

episodes.title: What Happened on a Certain Day in the Castle Town
episodes.plot: After returning from their first mission, the Black Bulls receive their first gold star.

episodes.title: The Wizard King Saw
episodes.plot: All eyes are on Asta as he and Sekke race to capture a purse-snatcher. Meanwhile, Yuno's first Golden Dawn mission takes him to an unexpected place.

episodes.title: The Wizard King Saw, Continued
episodes.plot: Yuno never expected his last-minute detour to involve such tragedy. It's up to the Golden Dawn to get to the bottom of their mission's many mysteries.

episodes.title: Dungeon
episodes.plot: Asta and Noelle are charged with exploring a newly discovered dungeon full of magical traps. Their leader, the battle-mad Luck, is less than helpful.

episodes.title: The Diamond Mage
episodes.plot: Suddenly the dungeon is host to several teams racing through traps to the treasure waiting in its depths--including a noted mage from an enemy nation.

episodes.title: Friends
episodes.plot: Asta, Yuno, and their squadmates must take on daunting foes on their way to the heart of the dungeon, but Luck remains dead set on fighting all alone.

episodes.title: Destroyer
episodes.plot: The Diamond Kingdom's secret weapon wields more powerful magic than anyone has seen. The Golden Dawn team is all but decimated. Can he be defeated?

episodes.title: Memories of You
episodes.plot: The Clover Kingdom's Magic Knights reach the dungeon's treasure hall, but another daunting battle keeps them from reveling in their victory for long.

episodes.title: Destruction and Salvation
episodes.plot: The dungeon itself turns against the Magic Knights as they fight to escape--and to keep a badly wounded Asta alive. Mars remembers how he came to be.

episodes.title: Assembly at the Royal Capital
episodes.plot: Asta and Noelle visit the royal capital to report on the dungeon mission, but get roped into something else entirely with their Golden Dawn friends.

episodes.title: Capital Riot
episodes.plot: The royal capital is under siege! The Magic Knight squads must set aside their quarrels and come together to defend the Clover Kingdom and its people.

episodes.title: Wild Magic Dance
episodes.plot: The best of the Magic Knights--plus Asta and Noelle--fight the hordes of undead beseiging the royal capital. Noelle suffers a crisis of confidence.

episodes.title: The Crimson Lion King
episodes.plot: The capital is attacked and it's up to the Royal Guard to stop them.

episodes.title: Blackout
episodes.plot: Rades wasn't the only invader--and the others are more powerful, their sights set far higher. The Magic Knights fall victim to a Spatial Magic spell.

episodes.title: Adversity
episodes.plot: What has become of Fuegoleon Vermillion? Yuno struggles to recover from his battle with the witch, while Asta's cursed wounds threaten to do him in.

episodes.title: Wounded Beasts
episodes.plot: The masterminds behind the invasion reveal themselves, though their motivation remains unclear. Asta spends quality time with one of his heroes.

episodes.title: Light
episodes.plot: The Wizard King, Julius, displays his power against enemies, and rescues Asta in the process.

episodes.title: The One I've Set My Heart On
episodes.plot: After some debate as to who to ask, Finral invites Luck and Asta to join him for a Mixer with 3 lovely ladies, to become more acquainted. Meanwhile, Noelle follows them to the tavern and gets a job as a worker just to spy on them.

episodes.title: Path
episodes.plot: Old friends and fellow squad members reminisce about Asta: his humble beginnings, his craziest battles--and underlying it all, his burning ambition.

episodes.title: The Mirror Mage
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls get a day off, which Gauche spends visiting his beloved sister Marie. Then a mysterious tragedy befalls the village--is Marie safe?

episodes.title: Pursuit over the Snow
episodes.plot: Asta and Gauche scour the countryside in search of Nean's children, who have fallen into the clutches of a ruthless monster thirsty for their magic.

episodes.title: Three-Leaf Sprouts
episodes.plot: As expected, there were bigger baddies behind the abduction of Nean's children. Luckily Sister Theresa is on hand to join the fight for their freedom.

episodes.title: To Help Somebody Someday
episodes.plot: Gauche reflects on his past as he struggles with protecting Marie versus helping Asta in his downhill battle against Sally's mutant magic monster.

episodes.title: Light Magic vs Dark Magic
episodes.plot: Backup arrives for Asta's showdown against the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun. Asta must push past his limits to pull off a tricky technique.

episodes.title: The Light of Judgment
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls seem to be on the losing end of an epic clash between two highly gifted magic users. Gauche has an idea that could turn the tables.

episodes.title: Three Eyes
episodes.plot: Three elite members of the Eye of the Midnight Sun pay a visit to their comrade Licht, prepared to make Yami and friends pay for what they've done.

episodes.title: The One with No Magic
episodes.plot: The Third Eye battle rages on, now with three talented Magic Knight captains providing backup. Licht reveals an intriguing tidbit about Asta's gear.

episodes.title: The Magic Knights Captain Conference
episodes.plot: The Wizard King calls a meeting of the Magic Knight captains. Asta has barely enough time to recuperate before being summoned to the royal capital.

episodes.title: Three-Leaf Salute
episodes.plot: There's a traitor among the captains! Marx's spell reveals who's been collaborating with the Eye of the Midnight Sun. Julius considers his next move.

episodes.title: A Black Beach Story
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls relax at the beach as they gear up for their secret mission. Noelle's showing off her new swimsuit--if Asta would pay any attention.

episodes.title: The Water Girl Grows Up
episodes.plot: Noelle's magic is indispensable for the fight ahead. A new friend has some tips to help improve her magic control, but Noelle has a long way to go.

episodes.title: The Underwater Temple
episodes.plot: The eccentric high priest of the Underwater Temple makes it crystal clear that the Black Bulls won't get their hands on the magic stone that easily.

episodes.title: Temple Battle Royale
episodes.plot: It's the misfit magicians of the Black Bulls up against the fearsome fish-masked Temple Mages. Noelle faces a surprising foe, and Asta uses his head.

episodes.title: The Pointlessly Direct Fireball and the Wild Lightning
episodes.plot: Vetto and his minions come to the Underwater Temple.

episodes.title: The Guy Who Doesn't Know When to Quit
episodes.plot: Asta and Kiato rush to help their allies when Vetto overwhelms Magna, Luck and Gio.

episodes.title: Awakening
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls and their new Underwater Temple friends pull out all the stops to take down Vetto, but there's far more to him than meets the eye.

episodes.title: The Only Weapon
episodes.plot: Vanessa and Finral find inspiration as a tattered remnant of Black Bulls bands together to tackle the mighty Vetto--who shows no sign of slowing down.

episodes.title: Despair vs. Hope
episodes.plot: Finral and Vanessa reflect on their pasts while guiding Asta's attacks, but they'll need to change it up to keep the furry fiend Vetto on his toes.

episodes.title: Beyond Limits
episodes.plot: Asta's never-give-up attitude has a impact on his fellow Black Bulls. Vetto recalls his youth, while Yami comes to a realization and takes action.

episodes.title: End of the Battle, End of Despair
episodes.plot: The Black Bulls recover after their fight against the Eye of the Midnight Sun took everything out of them--literally. Asta gets himself back on track.

episodes.title: Proof of Rightness
episodes.plot: The Clover Kingdom can barely breathe a sigh of relief before the border village of Kiten is attacked by the Diamond Kingdom's most fearsome generals.
